revision.text: {{talk header}} {{Article history |action1=GAN |action1date=08:09, 30 October 2013 (UTC) |action1link=Talk:Japanese aircraft carrier Sōryū/GA1 |action1result=listed |action1oldid=579427619 |topic=Warfare |action3=FAC |action3date=10:01, 23 February 2014 |action3link=Wikipedia:Featured article candidates/Japanese aircraft carrier Sōryū/archive1 |action3result=promoted |action3oldid=596753764 |currentstatus=FA |maindate=June 4, 2015 |action2=WAR |action2date=10:19, 28 January 2014 (UTC) |action2link=Wikipedia:WikiProject Military history/Assessment/Japanese aircraft carrier Sōryū |action2result=approved |action2oldid=592647150 }} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Military history|class=FA|A-Class=pass|Aviation=y|Maritime=y|Japanese=y|WWII=y}} {{WikiProject Japan|class=FA|importance=high|milhist=y}} {{WPSHIPS|class=FA}} {{ShipwrecksWikiProject|class=FA|importance=high}} }} {{American English}} == Revisions == I've made some revisions which all use the book "Shattered Sword: The Untold Story of the Battle of Midway" (Parshall and Tully, 2005) as a source. By all appearances it is a very carefully-researched work. Design: p.9. The bombing: p.251. Crew and casualty figures: pp.336, 470. Scuttling: pp.331-336. The captain's surname was corrected; the Japanese style is surname-first, so Yanagimoto Ryusaku's "last" or "family" name was Yanagimoto, not Ryusaku. "5-inch(100mm) guns" was revised because 5 inches is more like 120mm. The 5-inch guns were dual-purpose (anti-aircraft or artillery) and the 25mm guns were AA. --[[User:Shyland|Shyland]] 21:28, 16 August 2006 (UTC) == Anime References == The anime references are just silly. Can't the anime articles just reference the Soryu article? [[User:ThreeE|ThreeE]] ([[User talk:ThreeE|talk]]) 03:15, 26 May 2009 (UTC) == Congratulations!== Congratulations to all the contributors to this featured article. You deserve a lot of applause, recognition and appreciation. What a wonderful article. :  [[User:Bfpage|Bfpage]] |[[User talk:Bfpage|leave a message]]  13:51, 4 June 2015 (UTC) ::Thank you.--[[User:Sturmvogel 66|Sturmvogel 66]] ([[User talk:Sturmvogel 66|talk]]) 18:37, 4 June 2015 (UTC)
